radiographic_examinations.findings: Atelectasis in the included lung bases; mild central intrahepatic biliary duct dilation; gallbladder is surgically absent; spleen enlarged to 18.7 cm; right adrenal nodule measuring 2 x 1.3 cm; atrophic kidneys with a 2.4 cm hypodensity at the lower pole of the left kidney consistent with a benign cyst; possible stricture of the distal stomach; 2.8 x 3.8 cm lipoma in the mid ascending colon; no mesenteric or retroperitoneal lymphadenopathy, ascites, or free air.
